articles.title: Netflixâ€™s new Splinter Cell animated series kicks off in October
articles.description: The Splinter Cell: Deathwatch animated series finally has a release date and a proper trailer, but Netflix already wants you to start thinking about what else it has coming down the pipeline. During this year's Anime NYC convention, Netflix announced that Deathwatch is slated to debut on October 14th, and the series has added The […]
articles.author: Charles Pulliam-Moore
